Course.Name: Bioinformatics
Course.Description: This course will provide and introduction to the rapidly evolving field of bioinformatics with the overarching goal of understanding how computer science plays an integral part both in application and algorithmic aspects.
Course.Prerequisite: CSCI-3333 or CMPE 3333 or consent of instructor
Course.Course-attributes: Degree Elective, CS Instruction Fee - HU
